channel.title: 2023-08-03 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 2023-08-03 00:00:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 03 Aug 2023 00:00
item.description: A terrific few hours in Africam Safari. Felt like we were transported to a sanctuary in Africa. Also saw a Tibetan Takin! So wild, so cool. The overcast weather made the experience even more enriching.
item.content:encoded: A terrific few hours in Africam Safari. Felt like we were transported to a sanctuary in Africa. Also saw a Tibetan Takin! So wild, so cool. The overcast weather made the experience even more enriching.
